lines.text:
[after Mike punches Brad in the nose]
Drop it, Hammer! Drop it! Drop it. Should've known that you'd be here.
How's Boston, Carl?

[as Brad gets back up]
Shut up. I want the book.
You're not alone, pal.
I'm serious, Hammer. Where's the book?
Why are you so interested in Johnny Roman's diary?
Johnny Roman didn't have a diary. I'm talking about the account book.
Account book?
Account book, yeah. Where's Helen? Helen!
[opens the cabin boat's explosive booby-trap door and screams to his death]
Can I ask you a question?
Sure. Why not? You've been doing it since the day I met you.
Do you think I'm funny?
I don't know, Brad. I may be the wrong guy to ask. I've haven't smiled in three days.

The reason I asked is I've been thinking about changing careers. And I like working for Doctor Durant, but what I really want to do is be a comedian. I just don't know if I can make people laugh. That's all. You know.
You got a point.
Want to hear a joke?
No, Brad. I'll stick with the crime.
You're not even good comfort. You know that?
Find you own desert, pal.

I'm in a lot of trouble because of you. You know. I mean. What was I suppose to do? And why did you level with me? You're working for somebody, aren't you? That's right. You're being paid to get that book.
Maybe I don't like it when people get murdered. I mean. Doesn't anybody do anything anymore without getting paid for it?
Not in Las Vegas.
If Leora knew Bundy was cheating, why didn't the casino press charges?
I don't know. What are you talking about?
Unless she didn't tell the casino about it. What do you know about Leora?
Why are you so interested in Leora or shouldn't I ask?
Somebody was giving orders to Bundy last night. It could have been Leora. Unless it was you, Bradley.
You know. I think you are beginning to not like me.
You're still alive, aren't you? Let's go.
[he and Brad both step out of the car]

[pointing at Bundy's ranch house and laying his right hand on a utility pole]
Over there.
Come on.
[Brad walks to Bundy's ranch house with him afterwards]
If I catch you outside this hotel again, you are dead!
Save it for the ring, pal.
Wait! I've been looking all over for you. I was backstage last night recognizing that guy you were chasing. His name is Bundy.
Why didn't you tell me that before?
I couldn't. Not with Amy around. I know him from his place I used to go to. The Rosy Buttes Ranch. He works there.
What is he? A cowboy?
No, he's a bouncer.

[to Mike]
Will you sleep in my cabin tonight?
